ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.loop

Interface IControlLoop

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFrequency
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlLoop, ControlLoopWithTimers

    public interface IControlLoop
extends IFrequency
    Support for different alternative implementations of the control loop
    Author:
    pschatzmann
